textBeforeTable: Payment details Merchandise returned within 30 days of purchase with the appropriate Return Authorization (RA) number will receive a full product cost refund or credit, provided it is in perfect un-used condition in original undamaged and unmarked packaging, and is complete with all instructions and warranty card. To return a product, simply call our Customer Service Department at 800-266-8765 (Toll free in the U.S.) to obtain the required RA (Return Authorization) number. This number must appear on the outside of the shipment you make to us or it will not be accepted at our receiving dock. We recommend you insure your package, as we cannot be responsible for refund or replacement should your package get lost in shipment.
